name: Delve Deep
description:
Delve Deep is a procedurally generated dwarven dungeon crawler made for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo.

Play as a dwarf forced to flee the surface, as a horde of orcs and goblins chases you down into the depths of the earth. But don't forget to gather some gold and allies on your way down.

Controls
- Arrow keys or WASD to move.

There are also four different AI protocols to select from for your allies using the on-screen buttons:
- Follow: your allies will attempt to follow you. Those that cannot currently see you will look for you in the last location they saw you at.
- Assault: your allies will attack any enemies on sight.
- Mine: your allies will mine and collect gold from nearby veins that they have located.
- Escape: your allies will try to make their way to the stairs leading further down, provided that they have seen them.

Note: If you liked the concept of this game but wished it didn't slow down so soon and was overall less buggy, keep an eye on this space. I intend to release an updated version with bug fixes and general improvements once the Ludum Dare rating period ends.

Powered by the DragonRuby Game Toolkit. Graphics made with Aseprite. Sound effects generated using sfxr. UnifrakturCook font by j. 'mach' wust used under the OpenFont License. Source code available on GitHub.
